description: A unique kind of a cocktail that you may not find in any book, Autumn In New England begins by adding sage leaves and syrup to the base. Then topping it off with main ingredients such as&nbsp;bourbon, apple cider, cider vinegar, and ice cubes.
keywords: Autumn In New England Cocktail Recipe
How To Make Autumn In New England
name: Autumn In New England

recipeInstructions.name: Add sage leaves and syrup into the shaker tin.
recipeInstructions.text: Add sage leaves and syrup into the shaker tin.

recipeInstructions.name: Add bourbon, apple cider, and vinegar.
recipeInstructions.text: Add bourbon, apple cider, and vinegar.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake the mixture and keep it chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake the mixture and keep it chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Double strain the cocktail into the serving glass of choice.
